message.content:
Fix the following issues identified in the CEP extension:

1. **CSXS Version in manifest.xml** (`splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml:19`)
   - Change `<RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>` to `Version="9.0"` for PP 14.0 compatibility

2. **String escaping in jsx.call** (`splice-cep/panel/js/config.js:121-126`)
   - Add backslash escaping before other escapes
   - Add carriage return and tab escaping
   - Fix the escapedArgs mapping to handle Windows paths

3. **Error detection in evalScript** (`splice-cep/panel/js/config.js:90-95`)
   - Add detection for "Error:", "TypeError:", "ReferenceError:" patterns

4. **Null check in seekToTime** (`splice-cep/panel/js/main.js:816-825`)
   - Add sequence check before seeking

5. **QE error logging** (`splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx:96-104`)
   - Add $.writeln for error logging in enableQE

Read each file, make the fixes, and verify they are correct.

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ExtensionManifest xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
                   ExtensionBundleId="com.splice.panel"
                   ExtensionBundleVersion="6.0.3"
                   Version="7.0">

    <ExtensionList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main" Version="6.0.3"/>
    </ExtensionList>

    <ExecutionEnvironment>
        <HostList>
            <Host Name="PPRO" Version="14.0"/>
        </HostList>
        <LocaleList>
            <Locale Code="All"/>
        </LocaleList>
        <RequiredRuntimeList>
            <RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>
        </RequiredRuntimeList>
    </ExecutionEnvironment>

    <DispatchInfoList>
        <Extension Id="com.splice.panel.main">
            <DispatchInfo>
                <Resources>
                    <MainPath>./panel/index.html</MainPath>
                    <ScriptPath>./jsx/hostScript.jsx</ScriptPath>
                    <CEFCommandLine>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-file-access-from-files</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--enable-nodejs</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--mixed-context</Parameter>
                        <Parameter>--allow-insecure-localhost</Parameter>
                    </CEFCommandLine>
                </Resources>
                <Lifecycle>
                    <AutoVisible>true</AutoVisible>
                </Lifecycle>
                <UI>
                    <Type>Panel</Type>
                    <Menu>SPLICE - AI Video Editor</Menu>
                    <Geometry>
                        <Size>
                            <Height>800</Height>
                            <Width>400</Width>
                        </Size>
                        <MinSize>
                            <Height>400</Height>
                            <Width>300</Width>
                        </MinSize>
                        <MaxSize>
                            <Height>2000</Height>
                            <Width>800</Width>
                        </MaxSize>
                    </Geometry>
                    <Icons>
                        <Icon Type="Normal">./panel/icons/icon-light.png</Icon>
                        <Icon Type="DarkNormal">./panel/icons/icon-dark.png</Icon>
                    </Icons>
                </UI>
            </DispatchInfo>
        </Extension>
    </DispatchInfoList>
</ExtensionManifest>

content.text:
All five fixes have been successfully applied and verified:

**Summary of changes:**

1. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/CSXS/manifest.xml` (line 19)
   - Changed `<RequiredRuntime Name="CSXS" Version="10.0"/>` to `Version="9.0"` for Premiere Pro 14.0 compatibility

2. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/js/config.js` (lines 126-140)
   - Added backslash escaping first with `.replace(/\\/g, '\\\\')`
   - Added carriage return escaping with `.replace(/\r/g, '\\r')`
   - Added tab escaping with `.replace(/\t/g, '\\t')`
   - Applied same escaping to JSON.stringify for object arguments

3. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/js/config.js` (lines 90-99)
   - Added detection for `Error:`, `TypeError:`, and `ReferenceError:` patterns in evalScript error handling

4. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/panel/js/main.js` (lines 818-822)
   - Added null check `if (!app?.project?.activeSequence)` before seeking with early return and warning log

5. `/Users/imorgado/SPLICE/splice-cep/jsx/hostScript.jsx` (line 102)
   - Added `$.writeln('[SPLICE] enableQE failed: ' + e.message);` for error logging in the catch block
